channel.description: warmup Jumping jacks 3 sets of 25 reps Bodyweight squat 3 sets of 10 reps Mountain climbers 3 sets of 10 reps/leg 10-20 box jumps (3x3) and 10-12lb medicine ball throws to warm up (sandwhich between main lift warmup sets) 3-5 air dyne sessions per week 2 agile8 sessions per day if stiff and sore Agile8: l IT Band foam roll x 10-15 passes per leg. 2 Adductor foam roll x 10-15 passes per leg. 3 Glute/piriformis myofacsial release; best done with a lacrosse ball or PVC pipe x 30 seconds per side. 4 Rollovers into “V” sits x 10 reps. S Fire hydrant circles, 10 forward and backward circles with each leg. &Mountain climbers x 10 reps. 7 Groiners x 10 reps, holding last rep for 10 seconds. 8 Hip flexor stretch x 3 sets of 10 seconds per leg, perform all reps with one leg before switching to the other.
